80 TENDERS

PROCURING ENTITY: Bank of Jamaica

SCOPE: CONTACT INFORMATION: Provision of Electronic Know Your Head of Procurement, Customer (eKYC) Technology Procurement Management Department Solution Bank of Jamaica Nethersole Place Kingston, Jamaica PPC CATEGORY: 876-922-0750-9 1) Computers & Related Services or 2) Information Technology Services

TENDER DOCUMENT: SUBMISSION OF TENDERS: Bidding Documents are available for download on Bids must be submitted online via the e-GP the Government of Jamaica Electronic Procurement System website at www.gojep.gov.jm no later (GOJEP) website at www.gojep.gov.jm. Bidders than Friday, 09 January 2026 at 10:00 a.m. MUST be registered on the GOJEP System to (Jamaica Time) and Online Bid Opening will access the bidding documents and participate in the take place on Friday, 09 January 2026 at tender. Registration can be done by following the 10:15 a.m. An online Bid Opening Report will GOJEP System Quick Guide for Suppliers at be sent to all bidders. The System will www.gojep.gov.jm or contact Ministry of Finance automatically reject late submissions.

and the Public Service via email:

opppcustomercare@mof.gov.jm or Telephone:

876-932-5704.

Please note that notwithstanding the information provided in this Advertisement, the final instructions to bidders is the RFP and any notification that may be posted on the e-GP System website www.gojep.gov.jm. Bidders are therefore required to monitor the website for the most current information

The Bank of Jamaica reserves the right not to accept the lowest, or any other tender or to abort the tender process and reject all bids at any time prior to the award of contract without incurring any liability
